programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O raciocínio rápido de Boruto expõe o truque de Urashiki que o permite ver o futuro, e eles conseguem causar certo dano.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A batalha contra Urashiki acabou, e é hora de Boruto e Sasuke voltarem ao lugar que pertencem.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O desejo de Sumire vira realidade e ela se junta à Equipe De Ferramentas Científicas Ninja, deixando apenas Wasabi e Namida na equipe 15.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O aniversário de Hiashi, avô de Boruto, se aproxima e haverá uma pequena comemoração em família.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Enko Onikuma não tem conseguido controlar seu poder, atrapalhando seu trabalho nas missões.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Inojin aborda seus pais sobre dominar o jutsu de transferência de mente.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e Mitsuki são enviados ao Castelo Hozuki para proteger Kokuri, ex-membro de uma gangue brutal de bandidos.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.desc: Um cartão de madeira usado para evitar acessos não-autorizados à unidade médica é roubado, e os guardas da prisão vão em busca do culpado.

programme.title: Cartman conta para seus amigos sobre o seu sonho em que apareciam uns alienígenas que o abduzem e lhe introduzem uma sonda anal. Mas ao que parece, não foi apenas um sonho, já que algo está enlouquecendo as vacas deste pequeno vilarejo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O avô de Stan está fazendo 102 e quer se matar, mas como não pode fazer isso sozinho, pede a ajuda de Stan. Enquanto isso, a senhora Broflovski protesta contra um famoso programa da televisão um tanto quanto inapropriado.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kenny é esmagado pela Estação Espacial Mir e se transforma em um zumbi que dá início a uma enorme epidemia. Entretanto, o doutor diagnostica todos como se fosse apenas um caso de conjutivite.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes encontram um objeto misterioso em uma escavação escolar e saem no jornal. Barbra Streisand aparece na cidade buscando o tal objeto, pois é a última peça necessária para que ela possa se transformar em um monstro japonês gigante.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Uma onda de crimes toma conta de South Park, galinhas são molestadas e Barbrady pede demissão.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O Chef está sendo processado por tentar obter os direitos autorais de uma canção que escreveu há 20 anos atrás. Para ajudá-lo nesta batalha, os garotos organizam um concerto para arrecadar dinheiro.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Vários habitantes de South Park estão ficando cada vez mais furiosos, e sem alguma razão aparente. Randy é o principal responsável para descobrir uma solução para este problema. Enquanto isso, Kyle tenta "conseguir uma ereção".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman, Kyle e Stan enganam Tweek e Craig para que eles lutem um contra o outro. Enquanto isso, um dos professores está sendo atormentado por uma recordação de sua falecida namorada, e Kenny conquista um homem rico na aula de cozinha.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A mãe de Cartman dá um presente para ajudá-lo a ganhar o concurso de soletrar. Trata-se de um "macaco da fonética". Neste concurso, os rapazes conhecem Marc e Rebecca, dois irmãos que não vão para a escola, pois estudam em suas casas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman acha que é muito maduro para sair com Stan, Kyle e Kenny, e decide buscar novos amigos na internet, mas termina se metendo em vários problemas com pedófilos. Enquanto isso, Kenny tenta evitar que seus pais tenham outro filho.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Cartman entra para a ASNAMB (Associação De Sósias Norte-Americanos Do Marlon Brando)

programme.title: Cartman encontra um carregamento cheio de fetos abortados após o tombamento de um caminhão em um barranco. Em seguida, ele decide entrar para um novo negócio supostamente lucrativo: a venda de fetos mortos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes ganham muitos doces em um concurso, mas para conseguir o grande prêmio, precisam do cupom vencedor, que é aquele que ficou com Kenny antes de morrer.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kenny consegue o último videogame portátil da cidade. Porém, ele morre ao chegar no nível 60 do jogo, e vai ao céu, onde fica sabendo que Deus o matou de propósito, já que precisam dele para que salve o céu de um ataque de Satanás.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Numa homenagem ao filme de 1981, Heavy Metal, os garotos estão tentando convencer Kenny a largar a última droga da moda que viciou rapidamente os alunos do ensino médio.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kenny leva sua namorada ao show dos Jonas Brothers, mas com segundas intenções. No entanto, durante o show, são distribuídos a todos anéis de pureza, levando os sonhos de Kenny por água abaixo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman quer se tornar um corredor da NASCAR, mas ele acha que não tem condições porque não é "pobre e suficientemente estúpido" para alcançar seus sonhos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A verdadeira identidade de Mysterion finalmente é revelada. Enquanto isso, Guaxinim, desprezado por seus amigos super-heróis, está com sede de vingança.

programme.title: Guaxinim e amigos se encontram à mercê de Cartman, que agora tem o senhor das trevas, Cthulhu, trabalhando para ele. Kenny luta contra a maldição dos seus superpoderes através do seu alter ego, Mysterion.

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Dois caras nus em uma banheira

programme.title: Já que Butters parece encaixar tão bem com Cartman, Kyle e Stan, seus pais decidem ir com eles para passar um final de semana em Aspen. Ao chegar em Aspen, Stan, que não é nada experiente, se vê forçado a competir contra um campeão de ski.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan fuma uns cigarros de maconha que uns rapazes mais velhos deixaram e, pela noite, aparece um homem de 32 anos perdido e drogado que diz ser o Stan do futuro.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Um novo aluno mórmon se muda à South Park, mas não se dá bem com ninguém. Os rapazes querem que Stan comece uma briga com ele, mas na verdade, ele acaba se tornando seu amigo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Wendy termina o seu relacionamento com Stan, e para ajudá-lo, os meninos o levam a um restaurante famoso por suas asas de frango e suas belas garçonetes. Mas o plano não funciona e Stan se une a um grupo de góticos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os protetores dos animais se manifestam contra o uso de uma vaca como mascote da escola, e os estudantes se veem forçados a buscarem uma nova mascote, o que gera um conflito entre Cartman e Kyle, já que ambos tem ideias diferetes.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan se encontra com alguns lindos animaizinhos do bosque, que pedem para ele alguns favores inocentes. Após ajudar todos eles, Stan descobre que na verdade eles tem um plano para trazer o anticristo para o mundo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan e Cartman acabam inundando um dos vilarejos próximos a South Park. Como resultado, a cidade de South Park é declarada em estado de emergência, já que todos acham que isso é obra do aquecimento global.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Dois dias antes de depois de amanhã

programme.title: Stan estava buscando algo "divertido e grátis" para passar o tempo e aceita fazer um teste de personalidade oferecido por uns cientologistas e descobre que o seu "nível de alma" é surpreendentemente alto.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Agora Stan é o novo treinador de um time de hockey infantil e tenta fazer com que eles ganhem tudo. Enquanto isso, seu pai precisa lidar com a recordação do terrível desempenho de Stan em uma partida há alguns anos atrás.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan quer saber a verdadeira razão para as crianças decorarem os ovos de Páscoa e o que ovos e coelhos tem a ver com a morte de Jesus. Para chegar à verdade, Kyle e Stan se envolvem com uma sociedade bizarra que guarda um segredo lendário.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan e Kyle se tornam obcecados pelo Guitar Hero, chegando ao ponto de baterem recordes. Depois de um tempo Stan pensa que poderia ir mais longe na carreira com um parceiro diferente.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Um dia, os moradores de South Park acordam e descobrem que estão sem Internet. Randy descobre que ainda há Internet na Califórnia e junto com a sua família, eles se dirigem para o Oeste do país.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Enquanto a cidade está ocupada apontando culpados pela crise econômica, Randy apresenta uma solução para as dificuldades financeiras. Com a ajuda de todos os moradores, a cidade passa a viver sem qualquer economia.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Chegou a hora da corrida de pinhos em South Park e Stan e Randy estão trabalhando duro para construir o melhor carro. Enquanto trabalha no carro de corrida, Randy adquire um componente muito especial para garantir o primeiro lugar de Stan.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan se mobiliza para impedir que os japoneses matem todas as baleias e os golfinhos do mundo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os meninos fazem um perfil de Stan no Facebook contra a sua vontade. Stan acaba ficando de saco cheio com os pedidos de amizade e tenta deletar seu perfil, mas ele acaba sendo sugado para dentro do mundo virtual do Facebook.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan sofre de transtorno de acúmulo de bugigangas e, juntamente, com o Sr. Mackey, aceita ser tratado por especialistas. Stan entra no mundo dos sonhos
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A vida de Stan está um verdadeiro desastre, tanto em casa quanto na escola. Enquanto isso, a obsessão de Randy com a comida está mudando tudo, e inclusive faz com que Sharon descubra novos interesses.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Ao completar 10 anos de idade, a visão do mundo de Stan muda e também suas amizades.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan está tentando fazer com que sua vida volte ao normal e acaba descobrindo algo terrível. Enquanto isso, Cartman faz o melhor hambúrguer da cidade.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman lança seu próprio canal de vendas de joias na televisão. Isso gera um negócio bastante lucrativo, já que as joias, na verdade, são falsas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Butters é vítima de um bullying improvável. Agora ele quer conscientizar os demais alunos sobre os perigos do bullying e, para isso, ele faz um grande vídeo de dança.

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman descobre a verdadeira identidade do seu pai. Uma tempestade de neve prende os garotos no hospital. A equipe do America’s Most Wanted está na cidade. A equipe e os moradores ficam isolados e consideram o canibalismo.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: A Mãe do Cartman Continua Sendo uma Vaca

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Então eles resolvem roubar dentes, já que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman acha que é muito maduro para sair com Stan, Kyle e Kenny, e decide buscar novos amigos na internet, mas termina se metendo em vários problemas com pedófilos. Enquanto isso, Kenny tenta evitar que seus pais tenham outro filho.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Cartman entra para a ASNAMB (Associação De Sósias Norte-Americanos Do Marlon Brando)

programme.title: Todos acham que Cartman está muito gordo e decidem enviá-lo a um "Acampamento de Gordos" para perder peso. Por outro lado, Kenny está topando fazer qualquer coisa por dinheiro, e isso o leva às mais diversas insanidades.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman recebe como herança de sua avó um milhão de dólares e decide cumprir seu maior sonho: comprar um parque de diversão somente para ele, no qual ele não precisa fazer fila para subir nos brinquedos, já que ninguém mais pode entrar.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman se fantasia de um robô chamado "Genial-O 4000" e Butters acredita que ele de fato é um robô. Porém, a piada de Cartman se transforma em um pesadelo quando ele descobre que Butters tem um vídeo dele fantasiado de Britney Spears.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman estava tentando voar, mas o máximo que conseguiu foi um golpe na cabeça e isso fez com que ele ficasse dois dias em coma. A polícia local assume que agora Cartman tem poderes psíquicos e que pode resolver casos extraordinários.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os meninos ficam com raiva de Cartman quando ele come a parte mais gostosa das asas de frango, e decidem ignorá-lo. Todos começam a fazer o mesmo. Ao ser ignorado por todos, ele começa a pensar que está morto e que agora é um fantasma.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman promove o ódio na escola contra os meninos com cabelo vermelho, sardas e pele pálida, dizendo que eles não tem alma e não sobrevivem ao sol. Kyle, indignado, decide converter ele em um.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A mãe do Cartman quer encontrar uma maneira de controlar o seu filho. Ela busca ajuda em alguns programas de televisão, mas sem muito sucesso. Eis que surge César Millan, um adestrador de cães que aceita o desafio.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O senhor Garrison precisa explicar a Teoria da Evolução em aula, mesmo que isso vá totalmente contra os seus valores. Enquanto isso, Cartman mal pode esperar o dia em que lançam o seu novo videogame preferido.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman resolve congelar a si mesmo em uma tentativa desesperada de suportar a espera do lançamento do novo Nintendo Wii. Ele acaba despertando apenas 500 anos mais tarde, em um futuro nada agradável, e o pior de tudo: sem Nintendo Wii!
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Um Homem Dificil de Matar, (2003, Western)
programme.desc: Na fase final do Velho Oeste, um grupo de cowboys liderado por Monte enfrenta o envelhecimento e a falta de oportunidade oriunda do desuso de sua profissão.

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A família Zachary é uma família rica e influente do Texas, comandada por Ben e sua mãe, além dos outros três filhos, dois meninos e Rachel, que é adotada.

programme.title: Colina dos Homens Maus, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Um jovem pistoleiro, ferido em uma luta, é escondido e cuidado por artistas de circo. O homem é perseguido por alguns bandidos que querem se apropriar de sua mina de ouro. Quando os bandidos descobrem o esconderijo do pistoleiro, começa uma longa batalha.

programme.title: Gringo, Reze para Morrer, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: À frente de uma dúzia de bandidos, dois irmãos mantêm a pequena cidade de White City sob controle. Finalmente, porém, um caçador de recompensas, com a ajuda de um aleijado, tenta libertar White City de seus ferozes opressores.

programme.title: Uma Pistola para Ringo, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Após assaltar o banco local, uma gangue liderada pelo cruel Sancho se refugia em uma fazenda tomando como reféns seus habitantes.

programme.title: Renegado impiedoso, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: Pardon Chato é um índio Apache mestiço que vive na linha entre duas culturas, balanceando a sua tribo com o encantamento que tem pelo mundo dos brancos.

programme.title: Por uns Dólares a Mais, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Monco é um astuto caçador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: Se Encontrar Sartana, Reze pela sua Morte, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: O lendário herói Sartana é chamado para investigar uma série de roubos e assassinatos, que levam a consequências surpreendentes.

programme.title: Os Abutres Têm Fome, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura desenfreada e anárquica que se desenrola no México do século XIX, o mercenário americano Hogan salva a freira Sara dos seus pretensos molestadores.

programme.title: On The Job, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Inspirado na história real de um escândalo que envolveu presidiários sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para políticos corruptos.

programme.title: O Assassino do Central Park, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Seis melhores amigos do ensino médio se reúnem para uma noite de diversão no Central Park. O que eles ainda não sabem é que um assassino mascarado está à solta no local, apenas esperando para colocar o seu plano de vingança em prática.

programme.title: Assassinato no Expresso do Inferno, (2018, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Os passageiros de um trem são surpreendidos por um assalto que termina em assassinato.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: Missão: Pandora, (2022, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Após receber um pedido de socorro de uma embarcação, a Força Espacial Americana envia uma nave de resgate até Pandora, uma das luas de Saturno. Mas ao tentarem pousar, a tripulação descobre que o local é habitado por uma raça altamente evoluída.

programme.title: Meteoro: O Fim dos Tempos, (2023, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando um meteoro de enorme proporção ameaça destruir a Terra, um grupo de cientistas corre contra o tempo para encontrar uma maneira de salvar a humanidade da extinção.

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de tráfico sexual.

programme.title: Break Night, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: Demigod, (2021, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a história aterrorizante do local. Não demora até que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: Assassinato no Expresso do Inferno, (2018, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Os passageiros de um trem são surpreendidos por um assalto que termina em assassinato.

programme.title: A Invasão Zumbi, (2013, Zombies)
programme.desc: Quando zumbis tomam conta de São Francisco, um grupo desesperado sobrevive trancando-se dentro da prisão de Alcatraz. Quando os mortos-vivos violam a ilha, nossos heróis são forçados a retornar ao continente invadido pelos mortos-vivos.

programme.title: Não Adianta Rezar, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A vida de Anna finalmente está entrando nos eixos. Traumatizada depois de um conturbado divórcio e de uma intensa luta para se livrar de sua dependência química, ela finalmente vai se mudar de vida.

programme.title: Fera Da Neve, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Uma equipe de pesquisa na natureza selvagem se depara com um monstro aterrorizante.

programme.title: Mortos Vivos, (2020, Zombies)
programme.desc: Um xerife deve resgatar uma família distante de uma montanha durante a erupção de um vulcão e lutar contra uma horda de zumbis cheios de lava trazidos à vida por uma maldição.

programme.title: Tubarões de Gelo, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Uma nova raça de tubarões vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estação de pesquisa do Ártico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contágio, (2005, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalação após a liberação de uma bactéria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituição psiquiátrica encontra um velho tubo de vácuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactérias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi, (2011, Zombies)
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da população americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo país em busca de um refúgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: Páginas da Morte, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando um médico psiquiatra pesquisa um diário de meninas para descobrir por que ela assassinou toda a sua família, ele começa a cair no mesmo estado de insônia e confusão que a levou a perder a cabeça

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: Sesshoumaru fica furioso quando descobre o segredo por trás do Tenseiga. Totosai tenta convencer Sesshoumaru de que ele irá superar seu pai uma vez que ele seja capaz de abandonar seu apego à espada, bem como seu ódio a Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru rouba o poder de Tetsusaiga com Tenseiga, fortalecido pela lembrança de Kanna, um fragmento do Mirror Demon. Inuyasha se transforma em sua forma demoníaca e tenta atacar, mas Sesshoumaru dispara seu Meido Zangetsuha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A sacerdotisa Hitomiko perdeu a vida nas mãos de Naraku. Mas ela volta à vida e tranca Kagome dentro de uma barreira. Então, o verdadeiro poder espiritual do arco do Monte Azusa se revela!
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Kaede tentam descobrir o que está bloqueando os poderes de Kagome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kohaku permanece inconsciente depois de ser encarado por Magatsuhi, a vontade do mal. Kagome está preocupada, mas ela tem que se curvar e estudar para os exames de admissão, então ela decide voltar para casa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru persegue a má vontade, Magatsuhi. Mas é apenas parte de uma armadilha criada por Byakuya dos Sonhos. Magatsuhi encontra Kohaku inconsciente, e ele tenta entregar seu fragmento de Shikon para Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku está atrás do último fragmento de Shikon e ele toma Kagome como refém.

programme.sub-title: O Momento da Joia Ficar Completa

programme.title: Kagome se forma no ensino médio e retorna à era feudal. Shippo e Kohaku ficam na aldeia de Kaede, enquanto o resto da gangue se dirige para a batalha de Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O coração de Inuyasha é devorado pelo veneno da Jóia de Shikon, e ele se transforma em sua forma demoníaca. Ele machuca Kagome e a escuridão em seu coração toma conta dele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Os poderes espirituais de Kagome são restaurados e a luz divina é revivida na Jóia Shikon de Naraku. No entanto, Naraku usa isso como um chamariz para atrair Sango em sua armadilha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku tem vivido como um demônio apesar de ter um coração humano. Enquanto lutava contra ele, Kagome pergunta sobre seu verdadeiro desejo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku se dirige para o Poço do Comedor de Ossos e desaparece! Antes de desaparecer, Naraku faz seu último desejo para Kagome, ferido pelas mãos de Byakuya, ser engolido em Meido, o caminho para o submundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Quando a última pessoa a obter a Jóia Shikon faz o único desejo correto, a jóia será purificada e desaparecerá inteiramente deste mundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Anos após ser selado, Inuyasha, o meio-youkai é acordado por uma garota do ensino médio chamada Agome, que viajou no tempo atraves do poço Come-Ossos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Garota que Volta no Tempo e o Garoto Lacrado

programme.sub-title: As Pessoas Atrás da Joia de Quatro Almas

programme.desc: Quando fósseis gigantes são descobertos perto da Mongólia, uma expedição é organizada para analisá-los. Quando uma explosão deixa os membros da equipe de escavação enterrados no subsolo, eles descobrem um templo ciclópico e bestas gigantes antigas.

programme.title: O Retorno do Dragão - A Cidade Perdida, (2012, Adventure)

programme.title: Jungle - Protegendo a Selva, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Dipankar Nair administra um santuário de elefantes, mas as coisas começam a ir mal, pois caçadores estão matando elefantes por causa do marfim das presas dos animais.

programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: Honor, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Dois amigos do mesmo bairro que seguiram caminhos diferentes devem decidir se ficarão do lado da lei ou das gangues quando novos confrontos começarem.

programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: Honor, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Dois amigos do mesmo bairro que seguiram caminhos diferentes devem decidir se ficarão do lado da lei ou das gangues quando novos confrontos começarem.

programme.title: Fitzwilly, (1967, Comedy)
programme.desc: It’s handmaiden-to-footservant combat when secretary Barbara Feldon attempts to scuttle butler Dick Van Dyke right out of the heist business in this spirited comedy that also stars John McGiver, Norman Fell, Sam Waterston and Edith Evans.

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang, (1968, Musical)
programme.desc: A weird inventor, Caractacus Potts, invents an amazing flying car, which drives by itself. It takes him and his Family to Vulgaria, where the sinister buffoon Baron Bomburst kidnaps the car.

programme.title: The Greatest Story Ever Told, (1965, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Max Von Sydow, John Wayne, Charlton Heston, Sidney Poitier, and Shelley Winters head an all-star cast in this lavish portrayal of the life of Jesus from legendary director George Stevens. This stunning epic truly is The Greatest Story Ever Told.

programme.title: The Ten Commandments, (1956, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Raised as an Egyptian prince, Moses (Charlton Heston) discovers his Hebrew heritage, hears God's call, and engages in a bitter battle with the Pharaoh Ramses (Yul Brynner) to free the Jews from slavery, leading them to the Promised Land.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief, (1955, Thriller)
programme.desc: A famous cat burglar who has retired to the Riviera catches a thief imitating his old style.

programme.title: The Quiet Man, (1952, Comedy)
programme.desc: An American ex-boxer returns to Ireland to win the hand of a spirited young woman. He is confronted by local customs and the woman's belligerent brother. Set in the verdant Irish countryside, this film has beautiful scenery and local charm.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: The Condemned, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Jack Conrad is awaiting the death penalty in a corrupt prison. He is "purchased" by a wealthy TV producer and taken to an island where he must fight to the death against nine other condemned killers.

programme.title: Payback, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: After a successful heist, Porter is left for dead. Once he recovers, he seeks vengeance and wants his share of the money.

programme.title: Night Hunter, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: The hunt is on as a detective races against time to stay one step ahead of an arrested serial killer masterminding deadly attacks from behind bars. Henry Cavill and Ben Kingsley star in this action-packed thriller will shock you at every turn.

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen, (2013, Adventure)
programme.desc: Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part - IV: The Final Chapter, (1984, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: After his revival in a hospital morgue, the hockey-masked murderer fixes his vengeful attention on the Jarvis family and a group of hitherto carefree teenagers.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning, (1985, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: This time he seems to have set his sights on the young patients at a secluded halfway house. And more than a few of his teen targets end up in half, in quarters... you name it, Jason does it.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part VI: Jason Lives, (1986, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: As a child, Tommy Jarvis did what many others died trying to do. He killed Jason Vorhees, the mass murderer who terrorized the residents of Crystal Lake. But now, years later, Tommy is tormented by the fear that maybe Jason isn’t really dead.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood, (1988, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Ever since homicidal maniac Jason Voorhees got trapped in chains at the bottom of Crystal Lake, the nearby summer camp has operated without a hitch... without a murder. But one of this season’s happy campers has brought along a deadly secret.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan, (1989, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: The Big Apple’s in big trouble, as indestructible psycho-fiend Jason Voorhees hits the road to New York City - and paints the town “red.”

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Pet Sematary, (2019, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the terrifying novel by Stephen King... After the Creed family moves to rural Maine, they stumble upon an ancient burial ground with sinister powers. When tragedy strikes, a perilous chain of events unleashes an unfathomable evil.

programme.title: The Babadook, (2014, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: In this terrifying thriller, a mother must protect her son from an evil, supernatural entity that has escaped the pages of a children's book and is lurking in their home.

programme.title: Dead Ringers, (1988, Thriller)
programme.desc: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Peer into the complex personal pasts of Bucciarati and his fellow gang members, and uncover the thread that unites this diverse group of fighters into a single team and single expression of resolve.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Bruno and team, now self-chosen traitors, learn from Trish during a moment of calm at a Venetian café a trip to Sardegna is vital. Chaos, then, erupts as Narancia loses his tongue and ability to speak the truth.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: As Giorno is teleported between puddles with Squalo’s shark attached firmly to his jugular, Narancia tries to sniff out the perpetrator using his CO2 tracer but is inhibited by Tiziano’s tongue-fusing Stand, frustrating himself and Bruno’s team.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Bruno et al head to Marco Polo airport to venture to Sardegna to discover the truth behind Trish’s father. On the tarmac, however, is a swollen, neckless Stand user who, the team discovers while airborne, is linked to the freshly severed fingers onboard

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: At cruising altitude, Trish faces a voracious and fleshy mass of a Stand that strikes at the slightest movement. Meanwhile, Giorno’s incessantly pulsating broach, the key to the team’s survival, lies waiting—as does an unseen force within Trish.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Bruno and team make an emergency landing in Sardegna where the Hitman Team leader, Risotto, is also determined to uncover a certain mystery. Doppio, a timid, wide-eyed teen, the result of a seemingly impossible pregnancy, has his own goals on the island.
programme.sub-title: A Little Story From the Past ~My Name Is Doppio~

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Having discovered there is more to skittish Doppio than meets the eye, Risotto uses his Stand to manifest various metallic instruments of torture from within his enemy. Fortunately for Doppio, a way to foresee the inevitable offers a glimmer of hope.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: A picturesque Sardinian cliff becomes the bloody backdrop to Doppio’s sudden dominance over Risotto, courtesy of Narancia’s own Stand. On the beach below, Abbacchio works to rewind time 15 years to identify the identity of a certain photographer.
programme.sub-title: Under a Sky That Could Come Falling at Any Moment

programme.title: A Soldier's Story, (1984, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: A fine drama set during World War II, in which a black military attorney investigates the death of a black sergeant. The lawyer eventually discovers that the sergeant was both ashamed of his own culture and virulently hated by his men.

programme.title: Selma, (2014, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: From the Oscar-winning producers of 12 Years a Slave comes a powerful true story starring David Oyelewo and Oprah Winfrey. Facing violent opposition, Martin Luther King, Jr., led a historic march from Selma to Montgomery, changing the world forever.

programme.title: To Sir, with Love, (1967, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: A novice teacher faces a class of rowdy, undisciplined working-class punks in this classic film that reflected some of the problems and fears of teens in the 60s. Rating: Not Rated

programme.title: A Soldier's Story, (1984, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: A fine drama set during World War II, in which a black military attorney investigates the death of a black sergeant. The lawyer eventually discovers that the sergeant was both ashamed of his own culture and virulently hated by his men.

programme.title: Not Easily Broken, (2009, Romance)
programme.desc: Based on the best-selling novel by T.D. Jakes, a couple's strength and faith are tested after the wife is injured in a car crash and her husband becomes attracted to another woman.

programme.title: Selma, (2014, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: From the Oscar-winning producers of 12 Years a Slave comes a powerful true story starring David Oyelewo and Oprah Winfrey. Facing violent opposition, Martin Luther King, Jr., led a historic march from Selma to Montgomery, changing the world forever.

programme.title: Stomp The Yard, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: DJ hasn't been in college for a day before he's entranced by a lovely co-ed, April. After joining an official step group, DJ must balance rehearsals, work, and school, while at the same time winning the heart of the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: Stomp the Yard: Homecoming, (2010, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: In the countdown to a national step-off, rivalries at Truth University run red-hot. The Theta Nus are counting on new pledge Chance Harris (Collins Pennie) to lead the team to victory. But he's too caught up in his own problems to focus. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: 10 Brothers of Shaolin, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: The martial-arts action film 10 Brothers of Shaolin tells the tale of ten specially trained fighters, five monks, five laymen, who have been taught their skills in order to protect Master Chu, who needs all the help he can.

programme.title: Shaolin Deadly Hands, (1978, Action)
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a con-man and Wing Chun fighter is being held in a brothel.

programme.title: Shaolin Wooden Men [English Subtitled], (1976, Action)
programme.desc: After witnessing the murder of his father, Little Mute trains in Shaolin Temple for revenge and is taught by various teachers, one of which is clandestine.

programme.title: Snake & Crane Arts of Shaolin [English Subtitled], (1978, Action)
programme.desc: A martial arts book, which Hsu Yin-Fung (Jackie Chan) carries, is being highly sought by various clans and gangs, but he is in pursuit of someone himself.

programme.title: Shaolin Soccer, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: In this hysterical, eye-popping comedy, a team of misfits take their best shot at winning a championship by mixing martial arts with soccer. Using unorthodox game play, they face the dreaded Team Evil in the ultimate battle for the title.

programme.title: Shaolin, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: After ambushing and killing his rival, losing everything in the process, dispirited warlord Hou Jie turns to a Shaolin monastery seeking salvation.

programme.title: Reign Of Assassins, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Elusive assassin Drizzle transforms herself into modest shop owner Zeng Jing (Michelle Yeoh) in order to transport the remains of an exalted Buddhist monk to their eternal resting place, but finds her mission unexpectedly complicated.

programme.title: Ip Man, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Ip Man is the award-winning film adaptation about the life story of Ip Man, the grandmaster of the Wing Chun style of kung fu and sifu of legendary martial arts superstar, Bruce Lee.

programme.title: Ip Man 2, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Newly arrived in Hong Kong, martial arts instructor Ip Man encounters stiff opposition when he begins teaching the Wing Chun fighting style. But instead of bowing to his rivals' demands, he perseveres and retaliates with amazing speed and power.

programme.title: Earth Girls Are Easy, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Three aliens (Jim Carrey, Damon Wayans, and Jeff Goldblum) crash-land in Los Angeles' San Fernando Valley. A manicurist (Geena Davis) and her boss (the wacky Julie Brown) befriend the threesome, give them makeovers and show them the town.

programme.title: The Truman Show, (1998, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Truman doesn’t realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: Bottle Rocket, (1996, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: Newcomer Owen Wilson, in a star-making performance, co-wrote the screenplay about three best friends who attempt to escape their suburban boredom through a life of crime.

programme.title: Drugstore June, (2024, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil, (1989, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: It was murder! The blind guy couldn't see it. The deaf guy couldn't hear it. But now they're both wanted for it in the drop-dead comedy that reunites the outrageous comedy duo Richard Pryor and Gene Wilder. Rating: R

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.

programme.title: The Pink Panther, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Comic icon Steve Martin steps into the shoes of the late Peter Sellers and wonderfully reprises the role of the bumbling, world famous Inspector Jacques Clouseau in this remake of Blake Edwards comedy classic, The Pink Panther.

programme.title: The Pink Panther 2, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: Inspector Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of international detectives just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.

programme.title: Brideshead Revisited, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: A heartbreaking romantic epic, Evelyn Waugh's classic novel inspires this evocative story of forbidden love and the loss of innocence in Oxford, 1925. Oscar-winner Emma Thompson received acclaim for her performance in this heartfelt adaptation.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Romance)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Romance)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze plays a ghost who teams with a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg) to uncover the truth behind his murder — and to rescue his sweetheart (Demi Moore) from a similar fate.

programme.title: Remember Me, (2010, Romance)
programme.desc: Two people scarred by grief find happiness in each other. Robert Pattinson (the TWILIGHT films) and Emilie de Ravin star in this deeply romantic story with a stunning ending.

programme.title: Allied, (2016, War Drama)
programme.desc: When Intelligence Officer Max Vatan (Brad Pitt) learns his wife (Academy Award winner Marion Cotillard) may be conspiring with the enemy, he has only 72 hours to prove her innocence and save his family before he must do the unthinkable.

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Romance)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze plays a ghost who teams with a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg) to uncover the truth behind his murder — and to rescue his sweetheart (Demi Moore) from a similar fate.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan star in an enchanting romance about a widower whose son convinces him to find new love and the woman who answers his call.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Terminal, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two assassins carrying out a sinister mission, a teacher battling a fatal illness, an enigmatic janitor and a waitress leading a dangerous double life.

programme.title: Drive Hard, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Former race car driver traded the winner's circle for a 9 to 5 job, but his life shifts into overdrive when he is hijacked to be getaway driver in a $9 million heist.

programme.title: The Gunman, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Eight years after a successful assassination, a former mercenary finds himself the target of hit squads hired to ensure his silence.

programme.title: Killerman, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: LIAM HEMSWORTH stars in this gritty action thriller. After a car crash leaves money launderer Moe Diamond with no memory, millions in cash, and dirty cops hunting him down, he must race to survive in New York City's criminal underworld.

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss.

programme.title: Night Hunter, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: The hunt is on as a detective races against time to stay one step ahead of an arrested serial killer masterminding deadly attacks from behind bars. Henry Cavill and Ben Kingsley star in this action-packed thriller will shock you at every turn.

programme.title: Assassin Club, (2023, Adventure)
programme.desc: Henry Golding, Sam Neill, and Noomi Rapace star in this action-packed thriller. An elite assassin is given his final contract to kill six people around the world - only to discover the targets are equally skilled assassins hired to kill him.

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love, (1998, Romance)
programme.desc: After providing inspiration to Will Shakespeare, his case of writer's block cured, and a taste for romance rekindled by the mysterious Lady Viola. Gwyneth Paltrow, Joseph Fiennes, Ben Affleck, and Dame Judi Dench star in this Best Picture winner.

programme.title: You Can Count on Me, (2000, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of the Best Picture and Best Screenplay awards at the 2000 Sundance Film Festival, "You Can Count on Me" has been hailed as "the best American movie this year."*

programme.desc: Estranged from her family, Franny returns home when an accident leaves her brother comatose. Retracing his life as an aspiring singer-songwriter.

programme.desc: Two girlfriends on a summer holiday in Spain became enamored with the same painter, fully unaware that his ex-wife, with whom he still has a tempestuous relationship, is about to re-enter the picture.

programme.desc: Chaos reigns on the wide open plains as a host of stars, including Burt Lancaster and Lee Remick, have their eyes set on a shipment of whiskey and let loose in this wild comedy that spoofs nearly every convention of movie westerns.

programme.title: Cattle Annie And Little Britches, (1981, Western)
programme.desc: Two young aspiring outlaws (Amanda Plummer and Diane Lane) manage to join what’s left of the Doolin-Dalton gang, led by the aging Bill Doolin (Burt Lancaster). The gang’s heyday may be far behind them, but there’s still plenty of adventure left!

programme.title: Jane Got a Gun, (2015, Western)
programme.desc: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

programme.title: Meek's Cutoff, (2011, Western)
programme.desc: Settlers traveling through the Oregon desert in 1845 find themselves stranded in harsh conditions.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: The epic story of a mysterious stranger with a harmonica who joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

programme.desc: In this rousing Western, when a greedy rancher causes the death of an innocent man, former sheriff Bob Valdez (Burt Lancaster) orders him to provide financial support for the widow. But when he refuses, Valdez vows to exact justice at any cost!

programme.desc: The Turtles are back to battle a bigger threat alongside April O'Neil and vigilante Casey Jones. As they prepare to take on supervillain Shredder and his henchmen, Bebop and Rocksteady, they find themselves facing an even greater evil: the sinister Krang.

programme.desc: Tintin and his friends discover directions to a sunken ship commanded by Capt. Haddock's ancestor and go off on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of her…earning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: A-X-L, (2018, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A.X.L. is a top-secret, robotic dog created by the military to help protect tomorrow's soldiers. Code named by the scientists who created him, A.X.L. stands for Attack, Exploration, Logistics, and embodies next-generation artificial intelligence.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers, (2011, Super Swashbucklers)
programme.desc: A gifted ensemble cast sparks this bold retelling of Alexander Dumas’ classic tale of friendship and heroism. With Christoph Waltz as wily Cardinal Richelieu.

programme.desc: Young Charlie Kincaid, who discovers a secret headquarters under his home that seems to belong to a superhero. He shares it with his friends, and they start to believe that his estranged father might have a secret double life.

programme.title: Apocalypto, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Rain Man, (1988, Drama)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as an idealistic young wheeler-dealer whose life is changed forever when he discovers he has an autistic savant older brother (Dustin Hoffman, in a Best Actor Oscar-winning performance).

programme.title: Chicago, (2002, Musical)
programme.desc: Winner of 6 Academy Awards, including Best Picture, and based on the hit Broadway musical, Chicago is a dazzling spectacle cheered by audiences and critics alike, where crimes of passion make way for legends to those seeking the spotlight.

programme.title: All the President's Men, (1976, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Redford and Dustin Hoffman star as Washington Post reporters whose investigation of a hotel room break-in uncovers the greatest political scandal in United States history and leads to the downfall of President Richard Nixon.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Cube²: Hypercube, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Eight Strangers wake up in a bizarre cube with no recollection of how they got there. They soon discover that they're in a deadly dimension where the laws of physics don't apply and they must unravel the secrets of the hypercube in order to survive.

programme.title: Cube Zero, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Eight strangers wake up in a strange cube-shaped room with no recollection of how they came to be there.

programme.title: Return Of The Living Dead III, (1993, Zombies)
programme.desc: A young man uses a secret government chemical and program to reanimate his dead girlfriend, and helps her as she consumes the only thing that will nourish her—human brains.

programme.title: Evil Dead II, (1987, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Ash, the sole survivor of THE EVIL DEAD, returns to the same cabin in the woods and again unleashes the dead. With his girlfriend possessed and his body parts running amok, Ash must again single-handedly battle the damned in this unhinged horror classic!

programme.title: Return Of The Living Dead III, (1993, Zombies)
programme.desc: A young man uses a secret government chemical and program to reanimate his dead girlfriend, and helps her as she consumes the only thing that will nourish her—human brains.

programme.title: Evil Dead II, (1987, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Ash, the sole survivor of THE EVIL DEAD, returns to the same cabin in the woods and again unleashes the dead. With his girlfriend possessed and his body parts running amok, Ash must again single-handedly battle the damned in this unhinged horror classic!

programme.title: Night of the Comet, (1984, Thriller)
programme.desc: A huge comet passes near the earth, vaporizing nearly the whole planet. But a few partially exposed people are now blood-thirsty zombies, and they begin a hunt for the remaining humans.

programme.title: Nemesis, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The year is 2027 and troubled cyborg cop Alex is ordered to apprehend his former partner Jared, accused of smuggling data to information terrorists plotting to kill government officials.

programme.title: Nemesis 2: Nebula, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It has been 73 years since Alex failed and the humans lost the Cyborg Wars. When the Cyborgs learn that a young girl containing the DNA that could end their reign has been sent into the past, they dispatch the bounty hunter Nebula to kill her.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her...until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.title: Scream 3, (2000, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: The first film set the rules. In the sequel, the stakes got higher. In the third installment of the hit franchise SCREAM, all bets are off. It's an insidious game of horror movie mayhem with surprising twists and turns.

programme.title: Clive Barker's Lord Of Illusions, (1995, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Scott Bakula ("Sibling Rivalry") portrays Harry D’Amour, a private detective visiting Los Angeles on a routine investigation. Harry gets more than he bargains for when he encounters Philip Swan (Kevin J. O’Connor, "The Mummy").

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw, (1970, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: A young woman inherits an isolated mansion from a distant relative, but an unspeakable horror awaits her in the mansion's dank cellars.

programme.title: Rogue, (2008, Creature Features)
programme.desc: A rugged American adventure-travel journalist on assignment in the Australian outback encounters a man-eating crocodile.

programme.title: Day of the Dead, (1985, Zombies)
programme.desc: A small group of military officers and scientists dwell in an underground bunker as the world above is overrun by zombies.

programme.title: Ginger Snaps, (2001, Werewolves)
programme.desc: The Craft meets The Howling in this edgy, modern werewolf tale in which a teenage girl must choose between saving herself and joining her sister in an otherworldly existence.

programme.title: Ginger Snaps 2, (2004, Werewolves)
programme.desc: Brigitte is found by the police and taken to rehab when it's assumed that the wolfsbane serum is a narcotic. Without the serum, she cannot stop from turning into a werewolf.

programme.title: Harlem Nights, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: In the waning days of Prohibition, Sugar Ray and his adopted son, Quick, run a speakeasy called Club Sugar Ray. Gangster Bugsy Calhoune pays corrupt cop Phil Cantone to close Club Sugar Ray down.

programme.title: Cotton Club Encore, (1984, Musical)
programme.desc: Francis Ford Coppola's lavish, 1930s-era epic comes to a vivid new life in this newly remastered and restored version featuring never-before-seen scenes and musical sequences.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: Harlem Nights, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: In the waning days of Prohibition, Sugar Ray and his adopted son, Quick, run a speakeasy called Club Sugar Ray. Gangster Bugsy Calhoune pays corrupt cop Phil Cantone to close Club Sugar Ray down.

programme.title: Some Kind of Hero, (1982, Comedy)
programme.desc: This fast moving comedy is laced with drama as Pryor assays one of the finest roles of his career as Eddie Keller, a man who returns home after six years as a P.O.W. to find his world changed.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil, (1989, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: It was murder! The blind guy couldn't see it. The deaf guy couldn't hear it. But now they're both wanted for it in the drop-dead comedy that reunites the outrageous comedy duo Richard Pryor and Gene Wilder. Rating: R

programme.title: Running Scared, (1967, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Lots of laughs and a great camaraderie is the recipe for two street-wise cops that have decided to quit the force and open a bar.

programme.title: Beat Street, (1984, Musical)
programme.desc: Urban ghetto kids from the South Bronx find creative outlets in painting graffiti, breakdancing, rapping, and developing new disco D.J. routines.

programme.title: The Island, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A man goes on the run after he discovers that he is actually a "harvested being", and is being kept along with others in a utopian facility.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence, (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In a future world, humans share aspects of their lives with companion robots called Mechas. But when an advanced prototype robot child named David is programmed to show unconditional love, his human family isn't prepared for the consequences.

programme.title: Orochimaru and Kabuto suddenly appear before Tsunade and Shizune who are out sightseeing.

programme.title: Naruto’s ninja way is to never go back on his word. Naruto is seriously injured by Kabuto and hovers on the verge of death.

programme.title: Jiraiya, Tsunade and Orochimaru all release their summoning jutsu. And a fierce battle begins.

programme.title: Tsunade, Naruto, and the others start heading back to the Leaf Village where Tsunade will formally become the Fifth Hokage. At Tsunade's urging, they stop at a town with hot springs.

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Lee hesitates when Tsunade asks him whether he will quit pursuing the path of a ninja or choose to undergo a risky surgery with only a fifty percent chance of success.

programme.title: Boss Jirocho waits, confident that Idate will win. But Aoi, the ninja sent by the Wagarashi clan, stands in the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru is promoted to chunin, and he and his squadmates celebrate at a BBQ restaurant. In the hospital, Lee decides to undergo a dangerous surgery to repair his body so that he can remain a ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Sasuke release their ultimate weapons against each other, and just in time, Kakashi arrives to stop the fight.

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Shikamaru, Kiba and Akamaru are in hot pursuit of Sasuke and the Sound ninja. Naruto and Kiba are upset that they have been unable to catch up and decide to try a surprise attack at night.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akamaru sets explosives in the trees to trap Sakon. But an incensed Sakon turns the tables, and the explosives end up sending Kiba, Akamaru and Sakon off a cliff.

programme.title: Ukon, who is able to infiltrate the bodies of others, enters Kiba’s body and tries to merge with his cells.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: A Simple Plan, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: In a gym bag. That's how three men size up what they've found in the snowy Minnesota woods. They've come across a downed plane with a rotting corpse inside...and over $4 million stuffed inside a duffel bag. Finders, keepers? Maybe.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: From three-time Oscar-winning director Steven Spielberg, Catch Me If You Can follows Frank W. Abagnale, Jr. as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday!

programme.title: MAFIA, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: In the 1970s, a fierce crime boss (Ving Rhames) wreaks havoc on the streets. Detective Womack (Pam Grier) decides to put an end to this organized crime – even if it means breaking the law.

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: Lord of War, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Oscar winner Nicolas Cage stars in this taut, action-packed tale of a notorious arms dealer who sold weapons to dictators and successfully outran the law for nearly twenty years.

programme.title: A Simple Plan, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: In a gym bag. That's how three men size up what they've found in the snowy Minnesota woods. They've come across a downed plane with a rotting corpse inside...and over $4 million stuffed inside a duffel bag. Finders, keepers? Maybe.

programme.title: Get Shorty, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Golden Globe® winner John Travolta stars with Gene Hackman, Danny DeVito and Rene Russo in this wildly popular comedy of a gangster who turns into a big-time producer after he travels to Hollywood to collect a debt from a down-and-out filmmaker.

programme.title: Life of Crime, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A pampered housewife (Jennifer Aniston) is kidnapped by a pair of blundering ex-cons in an effort to extort money from her sleazy real-estate tycoon husband (Tim Robbins).

programme.title: The Apartment, (1960, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine and Fred MacMurray are superb in this tale of love and ambition in the world of big business that went on to garner a Best Picture Oscar.

programme.title: Red Rocket, (2021, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: Mikey Saber (a magnetic Simon Rex) — a charismatic con man and washed-up porn star — plots his return to the big time from small-town Texas in this wild, fiercely funny portrait of an American hustler and a hometown that barely tolerates him.

programme.title: Life After Beth, (2014, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: Zach is devastated by the unexpected death of his girlfriend, Beth (Aubrey Plaza) until she miraculously comes back to life. However, the newly returned Beth isn’t quite how he remembered and before long, Zach’s whole world takes a turn for the worse.

programme.title: The Apartment, (1960, Comedy)

programme.title: The Importance of Being Earnest, (2002, Romance)
programme.desc: From the hilarious adventure by Oscar Wilde comes this tale of two dashing young bachelors and the outrageous deceptions they find themselves in over love, starring Reese Witherspoon, Colin Firth, and Rupert Everett.

programme.title: Beautiful Girls, (1996, Dramedy)
programme.desc: A 10-year high school reunion creates some hilariously unexpected surprises for a group of friends. The guys of the old gang declare they're still ready to party with the "beautiful girls," while still struggling to figure out the opposite sex.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Jennifer Eight, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: They are the unidentified victims of an unsolved death spree, women linked by a killer’s gruesome handiwork and by police files giving them the code name “Jennifer.”

programme.title: Beautiful Girls, (1996, Dramedy)
programme.desc: A 10-year high school reunion creates some hilariously unexpected surprises for a group of friends. The guys of the old gang declare they're still ready to party with the "beautiful girls," while still struggling to figure out the opposite sex.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Rambling Rose, (1991, Drama)
programme.desc: A confused and over-sexed young woman is taken in by a respectable Southern family. She is warmly received but trouble begins when she cannot control her sexual desires.

programme.title: Citizen Ruth, (1996, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: In this outrageous satire, Laura Dern is Ruth Stoops, an irresponsible, care-free drug addict pregnant for the fifth time, horrifying everyone around her. Soon, Ruth's at the forefront of a national debate, when all she wants to do is party.

programme.title: Juggernaut, (1974, Deadly Disasters)
programme.desc: HMS Britannic is caught in a storm at sea, but the real terror is on board - seven bombs planted by a terrorist calling himself Juggernaut, who demands a high ransom in exchange for the passengers' lives. Richard Harris and Omar Sharif star.

programme.title: Capricorn One, (1977, Thriller)
programme.desc: A NASA Mars mission won't work, and its funding is endangered, so they decide to fake it just this once. But then they have to keep the secret.

programme.title: The Man In The Iron Mask, (1977, Adventure)
programme.desc: D'Artagnan and his fellow Musketeers plot to replace the ineffectual Louis XIV of France with his secretly imprisoned twin brother Philippe who is the firstborn and rightful king.

programme.title: The Duellists, (1978, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Keith Carradine and Harvey Keitel star in this dramatic film about two officers in Napoleon’s army who violently confront each other in a series of duels.

programme.title: The Killer Elite, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan and Robert Duvall star in Sam Peckinpah's tense, action-packed thriller that explores savagery and betrayal in the murky world of killers-for-hire.

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: Rollerball, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan stars as a rollerball champ in this fast-hitting, action- packed glimpse of a future where a brutal, no-holds-barred sport takes the place of war, and murder is just part of the game.

programme.desc: It's a family feud when The Shepherd and Ghost Gal face off in a Deletion Duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS
programme.desc: Playmaker and Ai detect a mysterious message from... the Earth Ignis? How is this possible when Earth was defeated and deleted by Gore?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS
programme.desc: Gore's ready to risk everything to take down Playmaker – including short-circuiting his brain!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Go With the Flow, Part 1
programme.desc: It’s sink or swim for Yuma when he puts his deck on the line and challenges Shark, the school bully, to a duel. Can Yuma beat the school’s #1 duelist, or will Yuma’s life points get reeled in by this ruthless opponent?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Go With the Flow, Part 2
programme.desc: It’s a dueling disaster for Yuma when a mysterious visitor from another galaxy suddenly appears, putting his duel with Shark in serious jeopardy!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: In the End, Part 1
programme.desc: When the city is thrust into chaos after several of its computers become infected by a malicious virus, Yuma and Tori set out to find the culprit.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: In the End, Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma must outduel his math teacher before his life points are subtracted and the virus planted in the city’s computer system goes viral.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Flipping Out, Part 1
programme.desc: When fellow classmate Flip offers Yuma an Xyz Monster, Tori and Bronk warn Yuma to stay clear of this two-faced trouble maker.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Flipping Out, Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma must figure out a way to defeat Flip or risk losing his Utopia card… and Astral forever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Sparrow, Part 1
programme.desc: When Nelson Andrews, star of the hit TV series “The Sparrow,“ becomes possessed by a Number Card, Yuma challenges him to a duel, putting Astral’s safety on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Sparrow, Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma must figure out a way to defeat The Sparrow and his powerful Galaxy Queen before Nelson and Astral disappear forever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Feline Frenzy
programme.desc: In order to find his missing friend Tori, Yuma must face off against a feline fanatic who has the purr-fect answers to his every move.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Shark Attack
programme.desc: Yuma discovers that Shark has started running with the wrong crowd and given up dueling. Can Yuma hook Shark back into battling, or are Shark's dueling days done forever?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Pack, Part 1
programme.desc: When Yuma learns that Shark is going to be set up to take the fall for stealing a priceless deck, Yuma challenges Shark’s thug friends to a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Pack, Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma and Shark’s tag team battle against The Pack reaches a fevery pitch, for if Yuma loses, he also loses Utopia!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Number Hunter, Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma and Astral face their toughest battle ever when they are forced to duel a mysterious individual who hunts Number Cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Number Hunter, Part 2
programme.desc: As the back-and-forth battle between Yuma and the mysterious Number Hunter continues, Yuma must duel like he’s never dueled before if he wants to save Astral, his Number Cards and his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Training Days, Part 1
programme.desc: The legendary Dark Magician and Blue-Eyes White Dragon come out of retirement when a wise old man named Master Roku challenges Yuma to a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Training Days, Part 2
programme.desc: After challenging Master Roku’s former student to a duel, Yuma relies on his master’s teachings in order to defeat the evil Kaze and save the Duel Sanctuary’s Legendary Deck!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: It’s in the Cards, Part 1
programme.desc: When a mysterious fortune teller agrees to help out Yuma’s friends, they soon find themselves in a terrifying situation. Can Yuma rescue his pals, or will the all-knowing Fortuno see to it that Yuma fails?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: It’s in the Cards, Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma must figure out a way to defeat the mysterious and all-knowing Fortuno if he wants to save his friends, his Number Card and his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Edge of the World
programme.desc: While on the way to School Spirit Day, Yuma realizes the Golden Key his father gave him is missing. As Astral and Yuma retrace his steps, Yuma shares the exciting story behind the Golden Key’s origins.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Roots of the Problem
programme.desc: When Yuma gets into a fight with Bronk, their friendship is soon put to the ultimate test when an evil Number Card takes control of Yuma.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Battle With the Bot
programme.desc: Yuma befriends a broken Litterbot only to discover that it has been programmed to do the dirty work for a wanted jewel thief. Can Yuma put a stop to this thief’s thieving ways, or will Yuma’s newest friend trash his plan to stop him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Shark Hunter
programme.desc: Shark tries to stop Kite from stealing Yuma’s Golden Key by challenging him to a duel. Can Shark sink his teeth into Kite’s life points and save Yuma’s prized possession, or will Kite’s cunning skills sink any chance Shark has of winning?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Hunting Down the Hunter, Part 1
programme.desc: With his Golden Key in Kite’s possession, Yuma must hunt down the Number Hunter if he ever wants to see Astral again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Hunting Down the Hunter, Part 2
programme.desc: While Yuma continues to search for Astral and the Golden Key, while Astral looks for a way to defeat Kite and save all his Number Cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Frozen in Time
programme.desc: When an unexpected phenomenon stops time, Kite is able to gain the upper hand by tapping into Astral's memories and witnessing firsthand the battles that he and Yuma have fought together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Let the Duels Begin
programme.desc: With the World Duel Carnival about to begin, Yuma gets set to take on the best duelists from around the world… that is, until he realizes he never entered. Can Yuma figure out a way to join the Carnival, or will Yuma’s efforts fall short?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Team Performance
programme.desc: The World Duel Carnival kicks off when Yuma is challenged by Striker, a soccer player turned duelist who has one goal in mind: victory.

programme.title: Nami uses her considerable skill as a navigator to put the Straw Hats on the verge of victory, but the captain of the Foxy Pirates has more than a few dirty tricks up his sleeve!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Silver fox foxy! The merciless interference!

programme.sub-title: Round 2! Shoot it into the groggy ring!

programme.sub-title: A barrage of red cards in groggy ring!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A seriously heated race! Into the final round!

programme.title: The Straw Hats somehow manage to defeat the Foxy Pirates and win back Chopper, but Luffy eagerly accepts the challenge of a rematch! What is the captain thinking? And will his crew mutiny?

programme.sub-title: Showdown on the cliff! Red light, green light!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The captains square off! The final combat round!

programme.sub-title: A mysterious boy with a horn and robin's deduction!

programme.sub-title: Now, let's get back our memories! The pirate crew lands on the island!

programme.title: Zoro and Luffy fight to the death, Nami attempts to orchestrate an uprising, and Sanji discovers he’s willing to kick a kid in order to get his memories back!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoro bares his fangs! A savage animal stands in the way!
